COMMENT_TX: $Devenski made a pickoff attempt at 2nd that was very wide and hit 2b umpire Laz Diaz in upper leg; it caromed to Altuve and Hernandez could not advance
$Astros challenged call that Springer was not hit by 2nd pitch; call was upheld - ball
$Astros challenged call that Forsythe was safe at 2nd; call was upheld - stolen base; call was changed from stolen base to safe on error on 10-30-2017
$Dodgers challenged call that Correa was safe at 2nd; call was upheld - double
$Dodgers challenged play at second, claiming slide interference by Reddick; call was upheld - no interference
